all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Pray always, that ye may not faint, until I come. Behold, and lo, I will come quickly, and receive you unto myself. Amen.
Doctrine and Covenants 88:126
Quote of the Day
"It is imperative that we have charity in our discourse, both public and private."
President Russell M. Nelson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
